      <title><![CDATA[Fortis' Shivinder Singh to quit, join spiritual organisation]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/fortis-shivinder-singh-to-step-down-join-spiritual-organisation/article1-1392642.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Fortis Healthcare executive vicechairman Shivinder Mohan Singh is stepping down from his position to join a philosophical and spiritual organisation Radha Soami Satsang Beas headquartered near Amritsar]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/58d57a50-f441-4e1f-a554-3d05a7428e88cinemaphotourl.jpg" length="2835" type="image/jpg" />
      <comments>http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/fortis-shivinder-singh-to-step-down-join-spiritual-organisation/article1-1392642.aspx</comments>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392642</guid>
      <pubDate>Wed, 23 Sep 2015 09:26:11 GMT</pubDate>
      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/58d57a50-f441-4e1f-a554-3d05a7428e88cinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="2835" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>Fortis Healthcare executive vicechairman Shivinder Mohan Singh is stepping down from his position to join a philosophical and spiritual organisation Radha Soami Satsang Beas headquartered near Amritsar</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>Fortis Healthcare executive vicechairman Shivinder Mohan Singh is stepping down from his position to join a philosophical and spiritual organisation Radha Soami Satsang Beas headquartered near Amritsar</itunes:summary></item>
    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Volkswagen says 11 million cars hit by scandal, probes multiply]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/volkswagen-says-11-million-cars-hit-by-scandal-probes-multiply/article1-1392569.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Volkswagen AG said a scandal over falsified US vehicle emission tests could affect 11 million of its cars around the globe as investigations of its diesel models multiplied heaping fresh pressure on CEO Martin Winterkorn]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/f64e6c5f-00c5-4334-b562-7dc7a2d3370bcinemaphotourl.jpg" length="1773" type="image/jpg" />
      <comments>http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/volkswagen-says-11-million-cars-hit-by-scandal-probes-multiply/article1-1392569.aspx</comments>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392569</guid>
      <pubDate>Wed, 23 Sep 2015 06:03:02 GMT</pubDate>
      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/f64e6c5f-00c5-4334-b562-7dc7a2d3370bcinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="1773" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>Volkswagen AG said a scandal over falsified US vehicle emission tests could affect 11 million of its cars around the globe as investigations of its diesel models multiplied heaping fresh pressure on CEO Martin Winterkorn</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>Volkswagen AG said a scandal over falsified US vehicle emission tests could affect 11 million of its cars around the globe as investigations of its diesel models multiplied heaping fresh pressure on CEO Martin Winterkorn</itunes:summary></item>
    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Sensex plunges over 265 points in early trade]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/bse-sensex-nse-nifty-markets-trade/article1-1392557.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The benchmark BSE Sensex plunged over 265 points and the NSE Nifty slipped below the 7800mark in early trade on Wednesday as retail investors started offloading their bets tracking a global selloff on weak Chinese factory data]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/8/1c8ec7d0-d784-4d25-9a47-5a5917632572cinemaphotourl.jpg" length="3634" type="image/jpg" />
      <comments>http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/bse-sensex-nse-nifty-markets-trade/article1-1392557.aspx</comments>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392557</guid>
      <pubDate>Wed, 23 Sep 2015 04:28:16 GMT</pubDate>
      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/8/1c8ec7d0-d784-4d25-9a47-5a5917632572cinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="3634" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>The benchmark BSE Sensex plunged over 265 points and the NSE Nifty slipped below the 7800mark in early trade on Wednesday as retail investors started offloading their bets tracking a global selloff on weak Chinese factory data</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>The benchmark BSE Sensex plunged over 265 points and the NSE Nifty slipped below the 7800mark in early trade on Wednesday as retail investors started offloading their bets tracking a global selloff on weak Chinese factory data</itunes:summary></item>
    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Rupee weakens 19 paise against dollar in early trade]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/rupee-dollar-foreign-exchange-trade-forex-markets-currency/article1-1392554.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Continuing its slide for the third straight day the rupee depreciated by another 19 paise to trade at 6607 against the dollar in early trade on Wednesday on foreign funds outflows amid a lower opening in the domestic equity market]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/4/90655e37-1852-4fa0-b213-d1bf28b3b545cinemaphotourl.jpg" length="3491" type="image/jpg" />
      <comments>http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/rupee-dollar-foreign-exchange-trade-forex-markets-currency/article1-1392554.aspx</comments>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392554</guid>
      <pubDate>Wed, 23 Sep 2015 04:14:06 GMT</pubDate>
      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/4/90655e37-1852-4fa0-b213-d1bf28b3b545cinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="3491" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>Continuing its slide for the third straight day the rupee depreciated by another 19 paise to trade at 6607 against the dollar in early trade on Wednesday on foreign funds outflows amid a lower opening in the domestic equity market</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>Continuing its slide for the third straight day the rupee depreciated by another 19 paise to trade at 6607 against the dollar in early trade on Wednesday on foreign funds outflows amid a lower opening in the domestic equity market</itunes:summary></item>

      <title><![CDATA[Modi set to ignite a start-up brainstorm in Silicon Valley]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/modi-set-to-ignite-a-start-up-brainstorm-in-silicon-valley/article1-1392542.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Flights from India to the United States these days have a younger braver tinge Several startup founders are on their way to Californias Silicon Valley for a halfday session on September 27 that will culminate with Prime Minister Narendra Modi taking the stage]]></description>

      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/eb82a3e7-b231-437a-bd16-60796ba33749cinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="4919" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>Flights from India to the United States these days have a younger braver tinge Several startup founders are on their way to Californias Silicon Valley for a halfday session on September 27 that will culminate with Prime Minister Narendra Modi taking the s</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>Flights from India to the United States these days have a younger braver tinge Several startup founders are on their way to Californias Silicon Valley for a halfday session on September 27 that will culminate with Prime Minister Narendra Modi taking the stage</itunes:summary></item>

      <title><![CDATA[Volkswagen impact: Govt may broaden emissions probe to all firms]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/volkswagen-impact-govt-may-broaden-emissions-probe-to-all-firms/article1-1392496.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[There could be more trouble in store for European auto giant Volkswagen which just recently became the worlds largest car maker as the US emission norms fudging scandal spread to Europe and Asia on Tuesday]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/a87a4ade-aabf-42d5-a69c-207a0e057e4ccinemaphotourl.jpg" length="2275" type="image/jpg" />

      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392496</guid>
      <pubDate>Tue, 22 Sep 2015 16:55:04 GMT</pubDate>
      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/a87a4ade-aabf-42d5-a69c-207a0e057e4ccinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="2275" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>There could be more trouble in store for European auto giant Volkswagen which just recently became the worlds largest car maker as the US emission norms fudging scandal spread to Europe and Asia on Tuesday</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>There could be more trouble in store for European auto giant Volkswagen which just recently became the worlds largest car maker as the US emission norms fudging scandal spread to Europe and Asia on Tuesday</itunes:summary></item>
    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Indian IT companies among the world's worst paymasters: Survey]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/indian-it-cos-among-the-world-s-worst-paymasters-says-survey/article1-1392071.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indian IT companies are among the 10 worst paymasters in the world says a survey  a midlevel IT manager draws an average salary of USD 41213 while his Swiss counterpart gets over four times more]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/4/90655e37-1852-4fa0-b213-d1bf28b3b545cinemaphotourl.jpg" length="3491" type="image/jpg" />

      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392071</guid>

      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/4/90655e37-1852-4fa0-b213-d1bf28b3b545cinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="3491" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>Indian IT companies are among the 10 worst paymasters in the world says a survey a midlevel IT manager draws an average salary of USD 41213 while his Swiss counterpart gets over four times more</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>Indian IT companies are among the 10 worst paymasters in the world says a survey a midlevel IT manager draws an average salary of USD 41213 while his Swiss counterpart gets over four times more</itunes:summary></item>

      <title><![CDATA[More reforms in the pipeline, better growth expected : Jaitley]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/more-reforms-in-the-pipeline-better-growth-expected-jaitley/article1-1392027.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Indias economic growth is expected to improve despite unfavourable global winds as the government continues with several reform programmes Finance Minister Arun Jaitley said on Monday]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/6b72a046-661b-4597-baf9-afbc71c04884cinemaphotourl.jpg" length="4047" type="image/jpg" />

      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392027</guid>

      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/6b72a046-661b-4597-baf9-afbc71c04884cinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="4047" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>Indias economic growth is expected to improve despite unfavourable global winds as the government continues with several reform programmes Finance Minister Arun Jaitley said on Monday</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>Indias economic growth is expected to improve despite unfavourable global winds as the government continues with several reform programmes Finance Minister Arun Jaitley said on Monday</itunes:summary></item>
    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Volkswagen to dismiss CEO over US emissions-cheating scandal]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/volkswagen-to-dismiss-ceo-over-us-emissions-cheating-scandal/article1-1392420.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Volkswagen will dismiss Chief Executive Martin Winterkorn a German newspaper said on Tuesday after the carmaker admitted to cheating US vehicles emissions tests and said 11 million of its cars could be affected worldwide]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2013/10/c42d2a81-8886-43bd-af6a-0915042988afcinemaphotourl.jpg" length="1841" type="image/jpg" />

      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392420</guid>
      <pubDate>Tue, 22 Sep 2015 12:35:40 GMT</pubDate>
      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2013/10/c42d2a81-8886-43bd-af6a-0915042988afcinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="1841" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>Volkswagen will dismiss Chief Executive Martin Winterkorn a German newspaper said on Tuesday after the carmaker admitted to cheating US vehicles emissions tests and said 11 million of its cars could be affected worldwide</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>Volkswagen will dismiss Chief Executive Martin Winterkorn a German newspaper said on Tuesday after the carmaker admitted to cheating US vehicles emissions tests and said 11 million of its cars could be affected worldwide</itunes:summary></item>
    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[L and T succession resolved, as SN Subrahmanyan takes the helm]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/larsen-and-toubro-succession-resolved-as-sn-subrahmanyan-takes-the-helm/article1-1392202.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[In what could be considered as a resolution of the muchawaited succession issue at L and T Indias largest engineering company late Monday said its board had approved the appointment of senior executive vice president SN Subrahmanyan as deputy managing director and president]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/f82307a4-ab0d-4978-8200-ad72de6529f5cinemaphotourl.jpg" length="2811" type="image/jpg" />
      <comments>http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/larsen-and-toubro-succession-resolved-as-sn-subrahmanyan-takes-the-helm/article1-1392202.aspx</comments>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392202</guid>
      <pubDate>Mon, 21 Sep 2015 13:12:32 GMT</pubDate>
      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2015/9/f82307a4-ab0d-4978-8200-ad72de6529f5cinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="2811" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>In what could be considered as a resolution of the muchawaited succession issue at L and T Indias largest engineering company late Monday said its board had approved the appointment of senior executive vice president SN Subrahmanyan as deputy managing dir</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>In what could be considered as a resolution of the muchawaited succession issue at L and T Indias largest engineering company late Monday said its board had approved the appointment of senior executive vice president SN Subrahmanyan as deputy managing director and president</itunes:summary></item>
    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[L&T Fin sells 5.3% to Bain Capital for Rs 708 crore]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/l-amp-t-fin-sells-5-3-to-bain-capital-for-rs708-cr/article1-1392087.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Leading NBFC LampT Finance Holdings on Monday said it sold 527 promoter stake to leading private equity firm Bain Capital through an issue of preferential shares and warrants for around Rs 708 crore]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2011/8/c0761711-eae6-4f27-b07d-97b46cdfb3f2cinemaphotourl.jpg" length="3618" type="image/jpg" />
      <comments>http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/l-amp-t-fin-sells-5-3-to-bain-capital-for-rs708-cr/article1-1392087.aspx</comments>
      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392087</guid>
      <pubDate>Mon, 21 Sep 2015 08:41:15 GMT</pubDate>
      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2011/8/c0761711-eae6-4f27-b07d-97b46cdfb3f2cinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="3618" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>Leading NBFC LampT Finance Holdings on Monday said it sold 527 promoter stake to leading private equity firm Bain Capital through an issue of preferential shares and warrants for around Rs 708 crore</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>Leading NBFC LampT Finance Holdings on Monday said it sold 527 promoter stake to leading private equity firm Bain Capital through an issue of preferential shares and warrants for around Rs 708 crore</itunes:summary></item>

      <title><![CDATA[Sensex in choppy waters, down 26 points on growth worries]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/sensex-pares-early-losses-still-down-59-points/article1-1392022.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[In a choppy session the benchmark BSE Sensex on Monday staged a smart recovery and covered up its initial losses to close just 26 points down at 2619298]]></description>

    <item>
      <title><![CDATA[Rupee closes 6 paise lower against USD at 65.73]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/rupee-cuts-initial-losses-but-still-down-by-13-paise/article1-1392021.aspx]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The rupee ended lower by six paise at 6573 against the US dollar on Monday largely due to fresh demand for the American currency from banks and importers on the back of higher greenback in overseas markets]]></description>
      <enclosure url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2011/8/0e509190-b2a4-4346-98a4-7f81dac8b94fcinemaphotourl.jpg" length="3632" type="image/jpg" />

      <guid isPermaLink="false">1392021</guid>

      <source url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/HT-feed/FeedXml.aspx?c=business">business</source>
    <media:content url="http://www.hindustantimes.com/images/2011/8/0e509190-b2a4-4346-98a4-7f81dac8b94fcinemaphotourl.jpg" fileSize="3632" type="image/jpg" /><itunes:explicit>no</itunes:explicit><itunes:subtitle>The rupee ended lower by six paise at 6573 against the US dollar on Monday largely due to fresh demand for the American currency from banks and importers on the back of higher greenback in overseas markets</itunes:subtitle><itunes:summary>The rupee ended lower by six paise at 6573 against the US dollar on Monday largely due to fresh demand for the American currency from banks and importers on the back of higher greenback in overseas markets</itunes:summary></item>

      <title><![CDATA[With Fed staying put, markets look to China for lead]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[http://www.hindustantimes.com/business-news/with-fed-staying-put-markets-look-to-china-for-lead/article1-1391989.aspx]]></link>
